data.title: Salem-Elm Ridge Water Supply Corporation
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Official Website of Salem-Elm Ridge WSC in Cameron, TX!
data.text:
RESCIND: Stage 2 Moderate Drought Conditions

All Customers

May 7, 2024

Salem Elm Ridge WSC is rescinding Stage 2 Moderate Drought

Conditions caused by drought conditions and low lake levels. Recent

rainfall has replenished Stillhouse Hollow Lake to near full capacity and

lake levels are still rising.

**We would ask that as summer months get drier to continue to

voluntarily continue to conserve water.**

RESCIND: Stage 2 Moderate Drought Conditions

All Customers

May 7, 2024

Salem Elm Ridge WSC is rescinding Stage 2 Moderate Drought

Conditions caused by drought conditions and low lake levels. Recent

rainfall has replenished Stillhouse Hollow Lake to near full capacity and

lake levels are still rising.

**We would ask that as summer months get drier to continue to

voluntarily continue to conserve water.**

New Payment Vendor with New Phone Number

Salem-Elm Ridge WSC has a new payment vendor to process payments. You can visit our website https://www.salemelmridgewsc.com/bill-payment or click this direct link https://secure.paystar.io/pay/salem-elm-ridge-wsc to make payments. We no longer have the 866 phone number for payments. To make payments over the phone, please call our new payment number 254-279-4344. Anyone previously on autopay will have to re-enroll in autopay with our new vendor by May 15th. Please visit our website for more information on Paystar's payment options.
